dct_title_s: Karte des Deutsch-Portugiesischen Grenzgebiets in SÃ¼dwestafrika
dct_description_sm: Map of the German-Portuguese border areas in South West Africa [Namibia] showing the large mining concession companies operating in the Kaokoland area in the Kunene region (Northern Namibia) and the Companhia de Mossamedes in Portuguese West Africa [Angola]. Also shown are farms in private hands, farms held by the Companhia de Mossamedes, military posts, telegraph stations and sites of mineral deposits.
Relief shown by shading, hachures and spot heights.
Bar scale on map given in "Kilometer."
"Lithog. u. Druck v. Dietrich Reimer (Ernst Vohsen) Berlin."
Mitteilungen aus den Deutschen Schutzgebieten. Band XXV, 1912, 9.
"M. Hillmann u. M. Thiel, Terrain v. F. Klimesch."
dct_publisher_sm: Verlag d. Kgl. Hofbuchn. v. E. S. Mittler & Sohn
